Body:
Description: Hello Team,

What is the process for uploading the server certificate on the EPP Server? We are encountering an unsecured connection error when attempting to access the EPP console.

Thanks,  
Pravin.
What We've Learned Updated: Client wants to know how to upload their own SSL certificate to get rid of the unsecure connection error for the EPP server.
Next Steps Updated: Sent out an e-mail with instructions on how to add the cert body and key to the EPP server settings and now we wait for their response.
